name: Face Plop
description:
Face Plop is something like a space shooter, just with other characters: Heads! At the moment it just has 3 Levels and 3 kind of enemys but we hope to improve the game with your feedback!

All character and animation are painted on our own.

Face Plop is the first game of our Company HS Factory. It's a very early Version of the game and we hope, you'll like it!

The game is made with GameMaker Studio.

Made by Jensibumbum.
